description: Marker interaction refinement and undo/redo - Improve marker drag behavior, hover affordances, visual alignment, and add undo/redo/reset support

userStories.title: Remove persistent marker active state
userStories.description: As a user, I want markers to only appear active while dragging so there's no confusing selected state.
acceptanceCriteria: Marker active state is entered only when user starts dragging
Marker active state is exited immediately when drag ends
Clicking a marker without dragging does not change its visual state
Remove any persistent selectedMarkerId or active marker concept from state
Active styling (if any) only applies during drag operation
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Show drag cursor on marker hover
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see an ew-resize cursor when I hover over a marker so I know I can drag it.
acceptanceCriteria: Cursor changes to ew-resize on marker hover
No click required to reveal drag affordance
Cursor returns to default when hover ends
Behavior is consistent across all markers
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Fixed to use CSS cursor style instead of visible arrows

userStories.title: Expand marker hover and drag area
userStories.description: As a user, I want a slightly larger hit area for markers so they're easier to grab.
acceptanceCriteria: Marker hover area extends ~4-6px beyond visible marker bounds
Expanded area is invisible (hit-testing only, no visual change)
Dragging can be initiated from anywhere within expanded area
No unintended overlap with neighboring markers at close distances
Expanded area does not interfere with section header UI
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Align keyboard badge and close icon correctly
userStories.description: As a user, I want the keyboard number badge and close icon properly aligned above the marker.
acceptanceCriteria: Close (×) icon is centered directly above the marker line
Keyboard mapping number (1-9) is positioned to the left of the close icon
Both elements are horizontally aligned (same vertical position)
Disabled sections do not display keyboard mapping label
Layout remains stable during hover and drag interactions
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Create generic useUndoRedo hook
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a generic hook that wraps state with undo/redo capability.
acceptanceCriteria: Create src/hooks/useUndoRedo.ts with generic useUndoRedo<T> hook
Hook accepts initial state and returns: state, setState, canUndo, canRedo, undo, redo
setState pushes current state to history before updating
undo() moves back one step in history (if canUndo)
redo() moves forward one step in history (if canRedo)
History is a linear stack with configurable max size (default 50)
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Integrate undo/redo into useMarkers
userStories.description: As a developer, I need useMarkers to use the undo/redo system for all marker operations.
acceptanceCriteria: Replace useState for markers with useUndoRedo in useMarkers.ts
All marker operations (add, update, delete, updateName, updateEnabled) create history entries
Expose canUndo, canRedo, undo, redo from useMarkers hook
Update MarkersState and MarkersActions types to include undo/redo
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add reset functionality to useMarkers
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a reset function that clears markers and undo history.
acceptanceCriteria: Add clearHistory() function to useUndoRedo hook
Add reset() function to useMarkers that clears markers and history
reset() sets markers to empty array
reset() clears the undo/redo history (cannot undo a reset)
Expose reset from useMarkers hook
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add undo/redo keyboard shortcuts
userStories.description: As a user, I want to use Cmd/Ctrl+Z to undo and Cmd/Ctrl+Shift+Z to redo.
acceptanceCriteria: Cmd/Ctrl+Z triggers undo when canUndo is true
Cmd/Ctrl+Shift+Z triggers redo when canRedo is true
Shortcuts are disabled during audio playback
Shortcuts do nothing when canUndo/canRedo is false
Shortcuts don't trigger when focus is in text input field
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add undo/redo/reset UI buttons
userStories.description: As a user, I want visible buttons for undo, redo, and reset actions.
acceptanceCriteria: Undo button with ↶ icon or similar arrow
Redo button with ↷ icon or similar arrow
Reset button with clear/trash icon or 'Reset' text
Undo button disabled (visually) when canUndo is false
Redo button disabled (visually) when canRedo is false
All three buttons disabled during audio playback
Buttons placed in toolbar/control area near existing controls
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add reset confirmation dialog
userStories.description: As a user, I want a confirmation dialog before reset so I don't accidentally lose work.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking reset button shows confirmation dialog/modal
Dialog message: 'Reset all markers and sections? This cannot be undone.'
Dialog has 'Cancel' and 'Reset' buttons
Cancel closes dialog without any action
Reset clears all markers/sections, closes dialog, clears undo history
Reset bypasses undo history (cannot undo a reset)
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
